categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Chancellor was an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate in the fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

The Chancellor was acquired by the Rebel Alliance sometime in or prior to 0 ABY. Around the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the Chancellor was serving as a command ship for the Alliance fleet. After many Renegade Flight pilots were lost, a plaque commemorating their casualties was hung in the crew lounge on the Chancellor's command deck.
